website_summaries.verdict: The best budget option from Sony to simply upgrade your car’s audio system without any additional features you don’t use.
pros: Fits into a single din space common in most older and modern vehicles that don't have an infotainment system
Adds a more powerful stereo with CD receiver and front auxiliary input for direct audio playback
The face plate is detachable to deter would-be thieves from stealing the system
cons: Requires a special bracket adapter if you want to replace a double din system or infotainment system

customer_reviews.title: Defective wiring harness
customer_reviews.text: The red power wire did not continuity check to the female component in the plug. I discovered this when the cd player would not power up. When I applied 12 v to the male pin on the unit, the cd would power up but I could not get the wiring harness to work. I attempted to fix it several ways but could not succeed in getting power to the female side of the plug. There is some damage where I tried to fix it but the wiring harness was defective on arrival. I spent 4 hours trying to get the plug to work so it was extremely frustrating
customer_reviews.author: Alan Ash

customer_reviews.title: If all function's were setting it would be too good to be true
customer_reviews.text: I've had three of these and each time the menu function will not set the complete menu's available? The menu key will not axis all function's or set them with memory, I got the clock set but now I can't axis clock or general, and various other function's I can't axis or set, If all function's were setting it would be too good to be true, I'm sad about it! P.S. I love this unit I just wish I could axis and set all the function's!!
customer_reviews.author: Ron Frasco

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great value for the price, love the way it sounds in my boat!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Thurston

customer_reviews.title: Loaded with features at a great price
customer_reviews.text: The number of features for the price is amazing! Great stereo and easy install.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Ramo

customer_reviews.title: No AM Radio Mid Wav
customer_reviews.text: Installed simple enough. Sounds great. NO AM RADIO! Mid Wav. Will not get some stations due to euro specs. No idea what to do with short wave.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey Freeze

customer_reviews.title: Great unit for price
customer_reviews.text: The unit was perfect for what I needed. It was easy to install and looks great. Added unexpected benefit was that it also can pick up SW radio .
customer_reviews.author: Impressed

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good stereo for the price and first for a teenager
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a few months now great radio.. no issues with it at all Update: okay I've took away a few stars because out of nowhere the radio keeps turning off and back on.., just blinking on and off it's weird but it would wait this long to act up
customer_reviews.author: Keura

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Great everything but needs Bluetooth and I real audio port, 5 months in exactly and sub no longer had output but through a cd it would play
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great stereo!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound! This unit has all of the features I needed and arrived as describe.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Radio
customer_reviews.text: The radio stopped working. At that price it should of least lasted a year or more. I am not going to buy anymore electronic things off of here.
customer_reviews.author: Mamie B.

customer_reviews.title: Its alright
customer_reviews.text: Form the price it's OK but my factory stock deck on my 2018 GMC sounds alot better. If you need a radio cause you need one then this will do but don't expect too much of anything
customer_reviews.author: 75vtec

customer_reviews.title: Great little CD radio!
customer_reviews.text: Some knuckle head stole my old one (but I did leave the face plate on) perfect for what it is, a nice little radio that will get abused in a Jeep. But my old radio was an explode as well and lasted about 5 years. Can’t beat $57.00
customer_reviews.author: devinedad

customer_reviews.title: Sony Sound!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Sony cd player for my truck , we had an older model and it played well. It was so easy to put in and in enjoy the sound.
customer_reviews.author: don58tel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Although lacking some newer integrations, this is a solid all around cd player and a steal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M. Brooksbank

customer_reviews.title: Sony explode
customer_reviews.text: Every Sony I purchase is the best. Always a quality product and consistent technology
customer_reviews.author: waldo

customer_reviews.title: SONY XPLODE!!
customer_reviews.text: Over and above my expectations. Great system, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry white

customer_reviews.title: Loudness selection does not work.
customer_reviews.text: Its OK for the price, but not very good at low volume. Apparently the "loudness" does not work because there is no change of sound when the loudness is turned on or off. This unit is not nearly as great sounding as a similar model I bought years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Andyman

customer_reviews.title: Great little radio
customer_reviews.text: Great little radio, good receiver of many stations, easy to install in my old PU truck...fair price , would recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wilburn

customer_reviews.title: IDK
customer_reviews.text: I usually love Sony car stereos, but do yourself a favor and buy the protection plan. The right channel went out of this unit in two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: gun smith45

customer_reviews.title: Buy and set up right you wont regret
customer_reviews.text: Great product have this in my dodge ram best with after market speakers
customer_reviews.author: Raiders28

feature_bullets: Plays CDs, CD-Rs, and CD-RW discs, with MP3 and WMA music files
Detachable face with a blue LED display
